title: Corrections
body:
The Washington Post is committed to correcting errors that appear in the newspaper. Those interested in 
contacting the paper for that purpose can:

Email:              corrections@washpost.com

Call: 202-334-6000, and ask to be connected to the desk involved - National, Foreign, Metro, Style, Sports, 
Business or any of the weekly sections. Comments can be directed to The Post's reader advocate, who can be 
reached at 202-334-7582 or readers@washpost.com
